title: FS/FT: Bunch of EPDGs including Titus (6/10 - Price Drop)
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Bunch of EPDGs including Titus (6/10 - Price Drop)
posts.post_content:
This is getting pathetic.  Bunch of dupe EPDG's available. Some are really tough to find.  Looking to sell them or trade them for ones I don't have.

Here's the collage of what I have.
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab121/thromdog/t206/total.jpg[/IMG]

If buying, PPF&F only please.  If buying 1 or 2 cards, shipping is $2.  3 or more and shipping is on me.  Most if not all are also on ebay right now.

PM me your email address for better scans.  Any "I'll take it" takes precedence over any negotiations.

And of course, I'm open to offers.

Here they are.


[STRIKE]$45[/STRIKE] $42 Wagner bat on right with a pinhole
[STRIKE]$49[/STRIKE] $42 Kaiser Wilhelm hands at chest
[STRIKE]$85[/STRIKE] $70 Al Burch, nice card
[STRIKE]$40[/STRIKE] $38 Wagner bat on left
[STRIKE]$75[/STRIKE] $60 Rudy Hulswitt, only 4 graded. 
[STRIKE]$88[/STRIKE] $70 Ed Cicotte, black sox
[STRIKE]$49[/STRIKE] $42 Bob Bescher hand in air
[STRIKE]$49[/STRIKE] $42 Johnny Bates, only 4 graded.
$Offer John Titus. No idea how to price him.

$SOLD Peaches Graham, only 7 graded
$SOLD Owen Wilson, nice card
$SOLD Jerry Freeman
$SOLD Steve Evans
$SOLD Joe Kelley HOF with backstamp


I also have some graded dupes available

[STRIKE]$165[/STRIKE] $155 Kid Elberfeld Fielding SGC 55
[STRIKE]$165[/STRIKE] $155 Kaiser Wilhelm Batting SGC 55
[STRIKE]$68[/STRIKE] $60 Tom Downey Batting SGC 20.  Gorgeous card for the grade.
[STRIKE]$65[/STRIKE] $58 Barney Pelty Vertical PSA 2(mc)
[STRIKE]$35[/STRIKE] $32 Nap Rucker Throwing PSA 1
[STRIKE]$78[/STRIKE] $72 Simon Nichols Batting PSA 1.5. Tough card.

Anyone got one to trade that I need????
